Package com.mc.controller

Class BaseCustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.mc.controller.BaseCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SharedControllerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddCustomerController, ModifyCustomerController
public abstract class BaseCustomerController extends Object implements SharedControllerInterface
Abstract BaseCustomerController class provides common functionalities for the AddCustomerController and the ModifyCustomerController. Implements the SharedControllerInterface to support currentUser handling.

    • setLabels

      protected void setLabels(String addMod, javafx.scene.control.Label headerLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label custIdLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label nameLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label addressLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label countryLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label divisionLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label postalCodeLbl, javafx.scene.control.Label phoneLbl, javafx.scene.control.TextField custIdField, javafx.scene.control.Button saveBtn, javafx.scene.control.Button cancelBtn)
      Sets the text for labels, buttons, and text fields based on the given mode ("add" or "mod"). Modes add or modify customers, respectively.
      Parameters:
      addMod - a string indicating the mode
      headerLbl - the header label
      custIdLbl - the customer ID label
      nameLbl - the name label
      addressLbl - the address label
      countryLbl - the country label
      divisionLbl - the division label
      postalCodeLbl - the postal code label
      phoneLbl - the phone label
      custIdField - the customer ID text field
      saveBtn - the save button
      cancelBtn - the cancel button

    • validateFields

      protected boolean validateFields(javafx.scene.control.TextField nameField, javafx.scene.control.TextField addressField, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> countryComboBox, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> divisionComboBox, javafx.scene.control.TextField postalCodeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField phoneField)
      Validates input fields and returns a boolean indicating whether the fields are valid.
      Parameters:
      nameField - the name text field
      addressField - the address text field
      countryComboBox - the country ComboBox
      divisionComboBox - the division ComboBox
      postalCodeField - the postal code text field
      phoneField - the phone text field
      Returns:
      true if all fields are valid, false otherwise
